Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4904 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.20.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-4904 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.20.1-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 16.20.1-2, affected by CVE-2022-4904
